title: Account Recovery *of some sort*
body: I need help changing an email that I dont have the password to anymore, I forgot it but can still log in with my password, it's just an annoying hassle. Any help would be amazing. Thanks!

replies.body: We'd be happy to help you update your email!  Hit us up in a[ support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can assist.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
